templates.name: Image Generation
templates.description: Create detailed prompts for AI image generation

fields.label: Faculty/Course Studying
fields.placeholder: e.g., computer science, humanities, law, accounting

fields.label: Art Style
fields.placeholder: e.g., digital art, oil painting, anime

fields.label: Additional Details
fields.placeholder: e.g., flying over mountains at sunset

templates.template: Create an image of {subject} in {style} style. {details} {quality}
templates.example: Create an image of a majestic dragon in digital art style. Flying over mountains at sunset with detailed scales and glowing eyes. 8K, ultra detailed, photorealistic

templates.name: Content Rewriting

fields.label: Faculty/Course Studying
fields.placeholder: e.g., computer science, humanities, law, accounting

fields.label: Original Text
fields.placeholder: Paste the text you want to improve

fields.label: Purpose
fields.placeholder: e.g., email, blog post, social media

templates.example:
Rewrite this text in a professional tone for email:

Hey, just checking if you got my last message about the meeting tomorrow. Let me know!

Make it more engaging and effective.

templates.name: Research Summary

fields.label: Faculty/Course Studying
fields.placeholder: e.g., computer science, humanities, law, accounting

fields.label: Research Topic
fields.placeholder: e.g., effects of climate change on coral reefs

fields.label: Key Sources/Findings
fields.placeholder: List or describe the main sources

templates.template: Summarise research on {topic}. Key findings include: {sources}. Provide a {length} summary with main conclusions.
templates.example: Summarise research on effects of climate change on coral reefs. Key findings include: ocean acidification, rising temperatures, and pollution. Provide a detailed summary with main conclusions.
